tool_description: Sends notifications through multiple channels when alert conditions are met or shipment status updates occur.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: alert, update, reminder, escalation

recipients.description: List of recipient identifiers (emails, phone numbers, webhook URLs)

channels.description: Delivery channels: email, sms, webhook, push

priority.description: Message priority: low, normal, high, urgent

retry_attempts.description: Number of retry attempts for failed deliveries (0-5)

error_messages: Invalid notification type: Use one of: alert, update, reminder, escalation.
Empty message content: Message content cannot be empty or null.
No valid recipients: At least one valid recipient must be provided.
Unsupported delivery channel: Use supported channels: email, sms, webhook, push.
Invalid priority level: Use one of: low, normal, high, urgent.
Retry attempts out of range: Must be between 0 and 5 attempts.
Delivery delay too long: Maximum delay is 1440 minutes (24 hours).
Too many recipients: Maximum 50 recipients allowed per notification.
usage: Provide notification_type, message_content, recipients array, and delivery channels array. Optionally set priority, retry_attempts, and delivery_delay_minutes for customized delivery behavior.

notification_id.description: Unique identifier for the sent notification

delivery_status.description: Delivery status for each recipient and channel combination
